Html:
I observe, that Touchless Demo takes 30% of processor's time (from 2.4G DualCore) and over 25M of working memory.
Quite big numbers. Why?

I'm sorry for moose on my desktop, it's only for testing these purposes ;-)
funny, my athlon 64 3500+ see's 85% when it cant see my markers, and 35% when it does. There is indeed a lot of work being done, but object recognition in robotics has been done on Pentium 133's.

I can only state in my defense that this is my first iteration of the project, and there is indeed plenty of room for improvement.
I hope that the community will take hold of the project with me and commit vast improvements to the underlyingÂ algorithms.
Everyone is welcome to browse the source code and fix or point out inefficiencies.
- Mike
I must say i ment no offense, just pointing out facts! This project is far beyond anything i could muster, and respect your skill! Improvement will come as time passes im sure.
